definition: surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]
Picornaviridae (virus family including many human pathogens)/small RNA virus

sentences.english: The utility model relates to an apparatus using ultrasonic to atomize liquids to tiny particles.
sentences.chinese: 一种利用超声波将液体雾化为微小颗粒的装置。

sentences.english: The application of Michelson interference principle in measuring small displacement is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍迈克尔逊干涉仪原理在测微小位移中的应用。

sentences.english: The gall bladder stores and discharges the bile, which helps to break down fats into minute droplets.
sentences.chinese: 胆囊储存和释放胆汁，协助脂肪分解为微小的颗粒。

sentences.english: There is also in the Bodleian Library a mutilated leaf of a very tiny Greek MS.
sentences.chinese: 也有在国立图书馆肢解叶的一个非常微小的希女士。

sentences.english: Frost consists of tiny crystals of ice which grow outward from a solid surface.
sentences.chinese: 霜包括从坚实表面增长向外冰的微小的水晶。

sentences.english: Minute fragments from cells of bone marrow.
sentences.chinese: 从骨髓细胞断裂的微小碎片。

sentences.english: The polygonal fault is tensional fault system with small throws, which is of nontectonic origin.
sentences.chinese: 多边形断层是一种非构造成因的断距微小的张性断层。

sentences.english: Shark skin is made of tiny scales known as dermal denticles that can be seen here.
sentences.chinese: 鲨鱼的皮肤是由被称之为肤齿的微小鳞屑所构成。

sentences.english: So many big arguments begin with small comments.
sentences.chinese: 许多大的争论往往始发于微小的谈话。

sentences.english: Don't waste energy fussing over a minor matter.
sentences.chinese: 不要在微小的事情浪费精力。

sentences.english: The big ball echoes the faintest sounds.
sentences.chinese: 最微小的声音在这大厅里也会产生回响。

sentences.english: Tiny models could be used as spies while gargantuan versions served as mobile armor.
sentences.chinese: 微小的型号能用于侦察，而巨型版本可充当移动机甲。

sentences.english: Minute fragments of shoot apices are proverbially difficult to culture .
sentences.chinese: 微小的茎尖切段通常是难以培养的。

sentences.english: However if the constraints are unsteady, a small real displacement is no longer a virtual one.
sentences.chinese: 而在非定常约束下，微小实位移不再是虚位移之一。

sentences.english: A tiny section of Macrocystis pyrifera (kelp) exemplifies the extraordinary features of this sea plant.
sentences.chinese: 巨藻的微小部分显示出这种海洋植物非同寻常的特征。

definition: a tiny bit/very little/next to nothing (idiom)
